mapper.insert:
insert into test values (null, #{name })
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: select distinct customer_code as customerCode, customer_name as customerName from tb_sell_taxbill;
select distinct tbs.item_code as itemCode, tbs.item_name as itemName, tst.sales_date as writeDate from tb_sales tbs, tb_sell_taxbill tst where tbs.sales_no = tst.sales_no;
select taxbill_no as taxbillNo, sales_no as salesNo from tb_sell_taxbill;

select tst.taxbill_no as taxbillNo, tst.write_date as writeDate, tst.sales_no as salesNo, tst.sales_date as salesDate, tst.customer_name as customerName, tst.customer_code as customerCode, tbs.item_name as itemName, tst.ceo as ceo, tst.manager_name as managerName, tst.bank_name as bankName, tst.deposit_no as depositNo, tst.deposit_post as depositHost, tst.total_supply_value as totalSupplyValue, tst.total_tax_value as totalTaxValue, tst.voucher_use as voucherUse, tst.tax_type as taxType from tb_sell_taxbill as tst, tb_sales as tbs where tst.sales_no = tbs.sales_no and tst.delete_flag = 'N' order by tst.taxbill_no desc, tst.write_date desc limit #{pagination.pageIndex }, #{pagination.listSize };

select tst.taxbill_no as taxbillNo, tst.write_date as writeDate, tst.sales_no as salesNo, tst.sales_date as salesDate, tst.customer_name as customerName, tst.customer_code as customerCode, tbs.item_name as itemName, tst.ceo as ceo, tst.manager_name as managerName, tst.bank_name as bankName, tst.deposit_no as depositNo, tst.deposit_post as depositHost, tst.total_supply_value as totalSupplyValue, tst.total_tax_value as totalTaxValue, tst.voucher_use as voucherUse, tst.tax_type as taxType from tb_sell_taxbill as tst, tb_sales as tbs where tst.sales_no = tbs.sales_no and tst.delete_flag = 'N'
and tst.tax_type = '${taxType }'
and tst.write_date between date_format('${startDate }', '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format('${endDate }', '%Y-%m-%d')
and tst.customer_code = '${customerCode }'
and tst.taxbill_no = '${taxbillNo }'
and tbs.item_code = '${itemCode }'
order by '${orderData }' desc
limit #{pagination.pageIndex }, #{pagination.listSize };
select count(*) as cnt from tb_sell_taxbill;
